description: Application to approve details of condition 4 (Construction Managemen) 5 (Electric vehicle Charging) 12 (Cycle Storage) 15 (Bat Boxes) pursuant to application 24/01346/FUL for Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to vary condition 2 (Approved Drawings) to provide the necessary level of accessible M(4)2 and M(4)3 dwellings together with other amendments such as: hip to gable on Plot 1-2 and increase in height of the building on Plot 3-6 to create a habitable rooms on loft space, changes to landscaping including changes to private amenity spaces of all dwellings, additional vehicular parking spaces of planning permission Ref: 22/00975/FUL for the Demolition of existing garages and erection of 6 no. dwellinghouses and associated amenity space. (Amended description)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
